titleStmt.title: A dose for Chamberlain, and a pill for the doctor; being an answer to two scurrilous pamphlets, written against the author of the Asses complaint, &c.
titleStmt.author: Cook, William, fl. 1661.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "VVhat ailes this bauling puppy thus to prate? ..."
In answer to Robert Chamberlain's Balaam's asse cudgeld; and Edmund Cooper's The asse beaten for bawling.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
